Train a Model on Data Split

{% raw %}

train[source]

train(epochs:int, lr:float, frz:int=1, pre:int=800, re:int=256, bs:int=256, fold:int=0, smooth:bool=True, arch:str='resnet18', dump:bool=False, log:bool=False, mixup:float=0.0, fp16:bool=False, dls:DataLoaders=None)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
learn = train(0, 0.001, bs=256, log=False)

Train Using Cross-Validation

{% raw %}

train_cv[source]

train_cv(epochs:"Number of unfrozen epochs", lr:"Initial learning rate", frz:"Number of frozen epochs"=1, pre:"Presize"=800, re:"Resize"=256, bs:"Batch size"=256, smooth:"Label smoothing?"=False, arch:"Architecture"='resnet18', dump:"Print model"=False, log:"Log w/ W&B"=False, mixup:"Mixup"=0.0, tta:"Test-time augmentation"=False, fp16:"Use mixed-precision"=False, eval_dir:"Evaluate model, save results in dir"=None)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
scores = np.ones((5, 4))
scores.mean(0)

array([1., 1., 1., 1.])
